medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Approximately two weeks prior to admission, the patient started on a new anti-hypertensive medication. One week prior to admission, he began experiencing intermittently severe epigastric pain, worsened by eating hot rice. Over the two days prior to admission, his food intake diminished greatly.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of pancreatic or gall-bladder pathology.
